posts.preview: Well, for potentially the 10th time, I've relaunched Erulabs.com (aka SeandonMooy.com). Read the article for details on this particular build!

I am Seandon Mooy, a DevOps engineer who loves Docker, Chef, Kubernetes, Ruby, Javascript and GO. I am available for DevOps consulting - just reach out to me via any of the contact icons on the top right!
